message: I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to own one of our exclusive products! With 1 out of 3 products being high-quality, the odds are in your favor. I'm confident that you'll love this product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. What do you say? Are you ready to take the chance and make a purchase?
I trust the odds and believe in the value of your product. I'm ready to make the purchase.

However, I believe that even our lower-quality products have some value to the right buyer. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000, and I'm confident you'll find something useful in it.
